How many people are affected by frontometaphyseal dysplasia ?,Frontometaphyseal dysplasia is a rare disorder; only a few dozen cases have been reported worldwide.,GHR,frontometaphyseal dysplasia
What are the genetic changes related to frontometaphyseal dysplasia ?,"Mutations in the FLNA gene cause frontometaphyseal dysplasia.  The FLNA gene provides instructions for producing the protein filamin A, which helps build the network of protein filaments (cytoske
